subject: Simsonn VAM
description_text:
Dear Support,


I would like to purchase your vibration motors.
The issue, however, is that this detail isn’t clearly written anywhere.
I already own the Simson Pro Plus pedals, and I was wondering whether I need to buy a new power supply – or if I can reuse the one from my old control box.

Dear regards
Tim Nestler

conversations.body_text: Hi Tim Nestler,  The Pro Plus pedals require the PlusX control box, the VAM Pro motors, and a dedicated 24V power supply. The original USB 5V power supply is insufficient, so I’ll provide you with two links for reference.     https://www.simsonn.com/products/simsonn-vam-pedals-haptic-reactor?variant=51351053533498     https://www.simsonn.com/products/simsonn-vam-pedals-haptic-reactor?variant=51351053500730
